title: Information about the swine flu vaccine
cleaned_text:
I just got this article from a friend titled “10 things you aren’t supposed to know about the Swine Flu Vaccine.” Not all 10 points need to be shared, but there were a few things worth mentioning from it…

In case you aren’t aware, the government is working to create mandatory Swine Flu Vaccinations. If you click that link you can send an email to your congressmen letting them know that you aren’t too excited about it.

A few of the eye-opening things I notice from this article…
• These vaccinations will not be tested for safety before the mass injection begins.

“I probably don’t need to remind you that in 1976, a failed swine flu vaccine caused irreparable damage to the nervous systems of hundreds of people, paralyzing many. Medical doctors gave the problem a name, of course, to make it sound like they knew what they were talking about: Guillain-Barre syndrome. (Notably, they never called it “Toxic Vaccine Syndrome” because that would be too informative.) “
• The government and pharmaceutical companies are not responsible for damage caused by the vaccine…

“Even if the swine flu vaccine kills you, the drug companies aren’t responsible. The U.S. government has granted drug companies complete immunity against vaccine product liability. Thanks to that blanket immunity, drug companies have no incentive to make safe vaccines, because they only get paid based on quantity, not safety (zero liability). “
• Vitamin D from the sun is always a better way to prevent the flu than a flu shot…

“No swine flu vaccine works as well as vitamin D to protect you from influenza. That’s an inconvenient scientific fact that the U.S. government, the FDA and Big Pharma hope the people never realize.”
